question: What is the theme of the 2018 World Mental Health Day (WMHD)?
option4: Young people and mental health in a changing world
answer: Young people and mental health in a changing world
explanation: The World Mental Health Day (WMHD) is observed every year on 10 October to raise the awareness of mental health issues around the world and mobilize efforts in support of mental health. It is a day for global mental health education, awareness and advocacy against social stigma. The 2018 theme is “Young people and mental health in a changing world”.
